0.1.0.name: wordpress/blade
0.1.0.description:
Note that the plugin is in beta and changes made in the future could result in your current code no longer working.

Blade is the templae engine for Laravel, a very popular php framework, developed by Taylor Otwell. This plugin brings the same template engine to wordpress. Using a template engine will result in much cleaner template files and quicker development. Normal php can still be used in the template files. The plugin also adds a wordpress specific snippet to blade. Check out the examples for more info.

echo/print

<?php echo $foo ?>

can be replaced with...

{{$foo}}

post data

<?php the_title() ?>

can be replaced with...

{{the_title()}}
